P11·2 | Brave the Elements | Card Name
P11·2 | Brave the Elements | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose a color. White creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: Choose a color. White creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: P11·3 | Doom Blade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
P11·4 | Treasure Hunt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card, then put all cards revealed this way into your hand.
trans-unit.target: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card, then put all cards revealed this way into your hand.

trans-unit.resname: P11·5 | Searing Blaze | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

trans-unit.resname: P11·5 | Searing Blaze | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, CARDNAME deals 3 damage to that player or planeswalker and 3 damage to that creature instead.
trans-unit.target: Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, CARDNAME deals 3 damage to that player or planeswalker and 3 damage to that creature instead.

trans-unit.resname: P11·8 | Hero of Bladehold | Card Name
P11·8 | Hero of Bladehold | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)

trans-unit.resname: P11·8 | Hero of Bladehold | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.

trans-unit.resname: P11·96 | Glissa, the Traitor | Card Name
P11·96 | Glissa, the Traitor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
P11·96 | Glissa, the Traitor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
